products.name: Phone Lasso Kit
products.description: Replacing your phone is expensive – and being disconnected from your world is stressful! The Phone Lasso’s rugged strength and durability allows you to take on life’s daily adventures with a simple peel, stick, click
details: Keeps your device safe from drops, dunks & loss
Universal for all cell phones and cases
Includes adjustable neck lanyard and wristlet for hands-free action
Metal carabiner hooks to belt loops, purses, bags, and gear
